infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to show your position on the map and help you navigate to delivery locations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location in the background to track deliveries and update your position in real-time.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to scan QR codes for order verification.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Delivery Driver to use your location for tracking deliveries.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Delivery Driver to use your location in the background for real-time delivery tracking.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Delivery Driver to use your location for navigation and delivery tracking.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Delivery Driver to access your camera to scan QR codes.
